nodes.text: Kara Xoo was a female Quarren who held the rank of Storm in Kassav's Tempest of the Nihil, commanding her own unit. After the Strikes Gwishi and Klinith Da, members of Xoo's unit, were captured after a skirmish on the moon Wevo, she decided to take revenge by attacking the planet Dalna. Xoo commanded the starship Poisoned Barb.
